overview:
Darren has guided and led OpenRoad since co-founding the company in 1995. A unique blend of strategic thinking, technological know-how, and great people skills, Darren maintains a presence in many of OpenRoad’s projects. His hands-on approach has helped organizations like the BC Supreme Court, Intrawest, and the Workers Compensation Board achieve success with innovative and powerful web applications.

Darren majored in Applied Physics at Simon Fraser University. He has been a guest speaker on topics ranging from Java to network security and is co-author of a book on JavaBeans 1.1 published by McGraw-Hill.
